atomic-application.description: Generate an Atomic Singularity compatible application. This project will contain the template code necessary to get started with using Atomic Singularity

atomic-library.description: Generate an Atomic Singularity compatible library. This is a default TypeScript project with reasonable default configurations

atomic-module.description: Generate an Atomic Singularity compatible module. This is a default TypeScript project with reasonable default configurations

atomic-project.description: Generate an Atomic Singularity compatible project. This is a default TypeScript project with reasonable default configurations
